title: SwapSkill
description: A full-featured skill-sharing platform where users can learn, teach, and exchange skills with real-time chat, gamification, and secure payments all powered by Next.js.

features: Real-time chat with Socket.io
Gamified learning with badges, points, and leaderboards
AI chatbot for instant user assistance
Community feed similar to Facebook for post interactions
Secure payments using Stripe and SSLCommerz
Role-based access for users and admins
Analytics dashboard for admin monitoring
Responsive design with light/dark mode toggle
details.challenges: Integrating real-time chat and gamified features while maintaining fast server-side rendering with Next.js.
details.futurePlans: Add AI-based skill recommendations and video-based learning rooms.

title: FitNexus
description: FitNexus is a complete gym management web app that streamlines memberships, scheduling, trainer assignments, and secure payments in one platform.

features: Firebase authentication with Email/Password & Google login
JWT protection for secure APIs
Role-based access: Admin, Trainer, Member
Admin can manage users, roles, transactions, classes, and trainer applications
Trainer can manage assigned classes, view earnings, and join forums
Member can book classes, make Stripe payments, submit reviews, and join forums
Community forum with role badges
Dashboard analytics with Recharts
SweetAlert confirmations and feedback system
details.challenges: Managing complex role-based permissions and integrating secure payment gateways.
details.futurePlans: Add mobile app support and AI-based personalized workout plans.

title: Transify - Smart Logistics & Delivery Platform
description: Transify is a modern, full-stack logistics and parcel delivery platform designed for speed, transparency, and reliability. Built with a focus on premium user experience and robust role-based management, it connects users, riders, and admins in a seamless delivery ecosystem.

features: Interactive & Dynamic Landing Page with Framer Motion animations
Secure Role-Based Dashboards (Admin, Rider, User)
Admin: User orchestration, logistics control, and financial insights
Rider: Job nexus, real-time status updates, and performance history
User: Instant booking, Stripe payments, and live parcel tracking
Integrated communication channels and notifications
Responsive design with nationwide coverage visualization
details.challenges: Implementing robust role-based access control and integrating real-time tracking with a seamless payment flow.
details.futurePlans: Expand nationwide coverage and integrate AI-driven logistics optimization.
